original_text:
And to him was given dominion
    and glory and a kingdom,
that all peoples, nations, and languages
    should serve him;
his dominion is an everlasting dominion,
    which shall not pass away,
and his kingdom one
    that shall not be destroyed.
korean_text: 그에게 권세와 영광과 나라를 주고 모든 백성과 나라들과 다른 언어를 말하는 모든 자들이 그를 섬기게 하였으니 그의 권세는 소멸되지 아니하는 영원한 권세요 그의 나라는 멸망하지 아니할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And to him was given dominion, glory, and a kingdom
that all peoples, nations, and languages should serve him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 민족과 나라와 언어가 그를 섬기게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: his dominion is an everlasting dominion
and his kingdom one that shall not be destroyed
